title: Diues [et] pauper
author: Parker, Henry, d. 1470, attributed name.
publisher: E[m]prentyd by me Wynkyn de worde,
notes: Often attributed to, but probably not by, Henry Parker--STC.
Place of publication and printer's name from colophon; publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
